description: Studies the non-traditional marriages of today - homosexual, older-younger, black-white and the unmarrieds. It opens with a sequence inside a gay bar in Washington, D.C. as two homosexuals tell about their marriage. Other participants in the non-traditional marriages are also interviewed. The film examines the life styles and frustration's of these marriages and includes analysis and comments by two psychologists and a marriage counsellor.
